summary: This document is a collection of Bureau of Prisons count sheets and inmate rosters from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated August 10, 2019. It records official inmate counts by housing unit and includes a roster showing inmates on suicide watch, providing a snapshot of prison operations on that date.

events.title: Daily Inmate Count at MCC New York
events.description: Routine official inmate count conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, recording a total of 758 inmates across various housing units.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: The document is dated August 10, 2019, the day Jeffrey Epstein was found dead in his cell at the MCC.
It shows a total inmate count of 758 at the MCC New York on that date.
An inmate roster lists four inmates with assignment codes related to suicide watch (SUICIDE R, SUICIDE 9R, PS WARE SUICIDE R).
The document is a routine administrative record of prison population counts and assignments.
No specific inmate names are listed in the provided text; only register numbers are visible (e.g., 86409-054, 48816-066).
